title: Science Leadership Competency Enhancement Course through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and managerial experience
context.additional_context: A course for corporate managers aged 40+ to develop science-based decision-making competencies in a blended learning environment. Project-based learning combining online content and offline workshops

learning_goals: Explain at least three decision-making processes using scientific data in blended learning environments
Demonstrate problem-solving competencies through two science-related projects conducted in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) format
Combining an online learning platform with offline collaboration enables the successful execution of team projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
